attributes.action: Debate properly in Parliament and not "score points" or "throw muck", tell us your policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Watching parliament debate should inform the public on the policies of the parties, amusing as it may be, jeering and making superficial arguments undermine our democracy the parties increase apathy and distrust. We have the vote, because we are considered capable of understanding the issues UPON WHICH POLITICIANS REPRESENT US. Show some respect, put egos and part politics aside and tell us what you represent, and then debate that issue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
